channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dead Fox, 14th October
item.description:
Fox hit by vehicle on PE Way. On grass verge between Baylis and Big Yellow.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29 Princess Elizabeth Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedging., 11th October
item.description:
Hedging is overgrown obscuring street lamps and close to telephone cables.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Appleton Way, Hucclecote

item.title: Missing pedestrian crossing control post, 11th October
item.description:
The post that had the button for the pedestrian crossing on it on the corner of Clarence Road & Evesham Road in Cheltenham has disappeared. It may have been damaged in an accident and since removed completely. The crossing can now not be operated from one side of the road. Please can the post with the button be replaced? Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Clarence Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Astridge Road, Witcombe

item.title: Litter flyposting 50mph limit sign post, 11th October
item.description:
This signpost is littered with crap that has been tyed to it needs to be cleaned up it is distracting to drivers it has been like this for over 18 months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Highfield Business Park A38, Deerhurst

item.title: Car with flat tyres left in space, 8th October
item.description:
This car has been left in this space for over a week with a flat tyres and no residents on the estate know who’s it is. It’s taking up a visitor parking space and clearly isn’t going to be moved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 13 Brickfield Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gate is inaccessible, 8th October
item.description:
Hi, this gate is the access to a footpath / right of way but it’s overgrown & impossible to open. I had to climb it to get access but then became tangled with the bramble growth.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Badgeworth Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
